Gabarit iService theme intranet

var defTop "top" script élément

var defTop = document.getElementById("def-top");
defTop.outerHTML = wet.builder.top({
    "cdnEnv": "esdcprod",
    "subTheme": "esdc",
    "GCToolsModal" : true,
    "lngLinks": [{
        "lang": "en",
        "href": "subtheme-iservice-en.shtml",
        "text": "English"
    }],
    "intranetTitle": [{
        "href": "http://esdc.prv/fr/index.shtml",
        "text": " iService IntraWeb",
		"boldText" : "EDSC/SC",
		"acronym": "Emploi et Développement social Canada / Service Canada"
    }],
    "customSearch": [{
        "action" : "http://hrsdc.prv/cgi-bin/rhdcc-hrsdc/recherche-search.aspx", // Mandatory
        "placeholder" : "Recherche sur l'intraWeb", // Optional 
        "method" : "get", // Mandatory "get" or "post"
        "hiddenInput" : [{
            "name" : "k",
            "value" : "fr"
        }, {
            "name" : "l",
            "value" : "fra"
        }, {
            "name" : "chk2",
            "value" : "True"
        }] // Optional
    }]
});
